meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or exclamation, typically expressing surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Jiminy! That was a close call!
meanings.sent2: Oh, jiminy, I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent3: Jiminy, I can't believe I ate the whole cake!
meanings.sent4: When the thunder roared, she exclaimed, 'Jiminy!'
meanings.sent5: The sudden noise made her shout, 'Jiminy!'

meanings.definition: A variant of the word 'gemini,' referring to the astrological sign.
meanings.sent1: She is a fan of astrology and always reads about Jiminy.
meanings.sent2: My friend's zodiac sign is Jiminy.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to know about Jiminy's horoscope.
meanings.sent4: The twins born in May are known as Jiminy.
meanings.sent5: In the sky, the constellation of Jiminy shines brightly.
